previewArticle.title: Colombia vs. Ivory Coast: 2014 FIFA World Cup | Group C Preview

recapArticle.title: Colombia 2, Ivory Coast 1: 2014 FIFA World Cup | Group C Match Recap

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.
Attempt blocked. Serge Aurier (Côte d'Ivoire) header from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Max Gradel with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Andrew Horn
timelineItems.text: Columbia made the first real move to score, now CIV has the corner. Love fast pace soccer #COLvsCIV

timelineItems.name: Caleb C. Robinette
timelineItems.text: End to end, very open play! There's plenty of goals in this match #COLvsCIV #WorldCup #LesElephants

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Pablo Armero (Colombia).
Max Gradel (Côte d'Ivoire) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: Sherazade Guellati
timelineItems.text: Tous les AFRICAINS derrière la CÔTEDIVOIRE ALLER LES ÉLÉPHANTS #COLvsCIV #COL #CIV #TeamCiv #TeamAfrique

timelineItems.name: moutoussa
timelineItems.text: #COLvsCIV le coup de pied tirrer mais ne donne rien sauf un contre colombien

timelineItems.name: ANGÉLICA CAMACHO
timelineItems.text: Excelente Colombia muy profundo por el la banda derecha #asivaelmundial #COLvsCIV

timelineItems.comment: Juan Guillermo Cuadrado (Colombia) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Cheick Tioté (Côte d'Ivoire).

timelineItems.name: Tee
timelineItems.text: Colombia is going to catch us on a counter attack guys beware...#COLvsCIV

timelineItems.name: Bob Guy
timelineItems.text: #COLvsCIV very sensible approach by CIV not in too much hurry, learn Nigeria and Ghana.

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Colombia. Conceded by Didier Zokora.

timelineItems.name: Dylan Maclean
timelineItems.text: Tiote is ruthless� #COLvsCIV

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Carlos Sánchez (Colombia) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top centre of the goal.
Offside, Côte d'Ivoire. Boubacar Barry tries a through ball, but Gervinho is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Alan Housden
timelineItems.text: James Rodriguez is a hell of a player, commanding in the middle and avoided being embarrassed when deflating a massive ball. #COLvsCIV

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Arthur Boka (Côte d'Ivoire).
Juan Guillermo Cuadrado (Colombia) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Serey Die (Côte d'Ivoire).
Juan Guillermo Cuadrado (Colombia) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Jimmy Nelson
timelineItems.text: I think the Ivorians are starting to get a little frustrated. Lot of fouls going against them in a short period of time. #COLvsCIV

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Colombia. James Rodríguez tries a through ball, but Mario Yepes is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Brooks Johnson
timelineItems.text: Howard Webb is calling this one, should be a fair match between two similar opponents #COLvsCIV

timelineItems.comment: Match ends, Colombia 2, Côte d'Ivoire 1.

timelineItems.name: Average Haiga Guy
timelineItems.text: Good game good game #CIV, one defensive mistake cost the match. #COLvsCIV #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Andres Espinosa
timelineItems.text: This has to be the most intense game I've seen this World Cup. #COLvsCIV

timelineItems.name: Aram Tolegian
timelineItems.text: There it is!!! Had to sweat a bit ... but Colombia delivers! #COLvsCIV

timelineItems.name: Andrew Horn
timelineItems.text: Columbia wins 2-1 over Ivory Coast. Fantastic game of soccer, unlucky for Ivory Coast not to earn at least 1 point today #COLvCIV

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Germany is 4-1-1 vs African teams at the #WorldCup, and all 7 of Germany's goals were scored in the 2nd half.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Miroslav Klose's 15 #WorldCup goals by location. Average distance: 8 yards. http://t.co/lMhHsJhCx3

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Miroslav Klose's 15 #WorldCup goals by location. Average distance: 8 yards. http://t.co/lMhHsJhCx3

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 97% - Ross Barkley has completed 28 of his 29 attempted passes & crosses at the #WorldCup. Tidy.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Asamoah Gyan puts Ghana up 2-1 on Germany. He's scored 5 of Ghana's 11 #WorldCup goals.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Asamoah Gyan puts Ghana up 2-1 on Germany. He's scored 5 of Ghana's 12 #WorldCup goals.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Miroslav Klose scores his 15th #WorldCup goal, tying the all-time record held (Brazilian) Ronaldo.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Miroslav Klose scores his 15th #WorldCup goal, tying the all-time record held by (Brazilian) Ronaldo.

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 3 - Miroslav Klose is the third player to net at four different #WorldCup finals (after Pele and Seeler). Longevity.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: And for fun, here are Ronaldo's 15 #WorldCup goals. Average distance: 13 yards. http://t.co/pL2acnIu6C

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: And for fun, here are Ronaldo's 15 #WorldCup goals. Average distance: 13 yards. http://t.co/pL2acnIu6C

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Today's #WorldCup coverage: BEL-RUS: 11:30 AM ET, ABC KOR-ALG: 2:30 ET, ABC #USMNT-POR: 5 ET, ESPN

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 4Y 1R - #URU have been shown more cards in the 2014 #WorldCup so far than any other team. Rough.

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 15 - All-time #WorldCup top scorers, with Klose and Ronaldo joint-top. Graphic. #GER #BRA http://t.co/GdSLf51bC9

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 15 - All-time #WorldCup top scorers, with Klose and Ronaldo joint-top. Graphic. #GER #BRA http://t.co/GdSLf51bC9

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Luis Suárez puts Uruguay up 1-0 on England with his fourth goal in seven career #WorldCup games.

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 3 - Edinson Cavani has played a part in three of #URU's last four #WorldCup goals (two goals, one assist). Contribution.

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 66 - Eusebio fired in 66 shots in the 1966 #WorldCup - the most by any player in one tournament between 1966 & 2010. Clicketyclick.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: This is the 20th time England has conceded first at the #WorldCup. Only win: 1966 final vs West Germany.

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 1 - Joe Hart has saved just one of the six shots on target he has faced at the #WorldCup (4 goals + Jagielka clearance off line). Stranded.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Wayne Rooney scores his first goal in 10 career #WorldCup games.

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 759 - Wayne Rooney has scored his first #WorldCup goal for #ENG, ending a run of 759 minutes. Wait.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: England has conceded 2+ goals in consecutive games in the same #WorldCup for the first time.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: England has lost consecutive games at a #WorldCup for the second time, first since 1950 (U.S. & Spain).

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Today's #WorldCup coverage: ITA-CRC: 11:30 AM ET, ESPN SUI-FRA: 2:30 ET, ESPN HON-ECU: 5:30 ET, ESPN

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 0 - No team has ever lost their opening two games at the #WorldCup and advanced from the group. Miracle.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Nigeria ends a 9-game #WorldCup winless streak with its 1st WC win since 1998. Bosnia-Herzegovina is eliminated.

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 7 - Played more than 1000 mins at #WorldCup Shilton, R Charlton, A Cole, Beckham, Moore, Butcher & @GaryLineker Answer. 1st @Eddy39

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Kostas Katsouranis is the first Greek player ever sent off a a #WorldCup.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Greece completed 72 passes in the first half, fewest by any team in a first half at this #WorldCup.

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 2 - #ITA have not won their second game at a #WorldCup in any of the last three editions. (D2 L1). Nervous.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Belgium advances to the #WorldCup knockout round for the first time since 2002.

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 0 - #GRE have failed to keep a clean sheet in any of their seven #WorldCup matches. Imminent?

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: With the Japan-Greece draw, Colombia advances to the #WorldCup knockout round for the 2nd time, 1st since 1990

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Greece posts its first #WorldCup shutout and gets a point for the second time in eight WC games.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Costa Rica leads a #WorldCup game at halftime for the first time.

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 20 - The record for offsides in a #WorldCup match between 1966 & 2014 is England against Kuwait in 1982. Caught.

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 20 - The record for a team being flagged offside in a #WorldCup match between 1966 & 2014 is England against Kuwait in 1982. Caught.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Costa Rica is the 3rd current CONCACAF nation to win its 1st two games at a #WorldCup (2002 Mexico, 1930 U.S.).

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 1958 - #ENG have been eliminated at the opening group stage of a #WorldCup for the first time since 1958. Beaten.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Italy has lost to a current CONCACAF country at the #WorldCup for the first time ever in 8 meetings.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: England is eliminated in the #WorldCup group stage for the first time in 11 appearances since 1958.

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 4 - Algeria are the first African team to score four goals in a single #WorldCup match. History. #ALG

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Algeria is the first African team to score four goals in a #WorldCup game.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: #USMNT-Portugal pregame now on ESPN. First meeting since a U.S. 3-2 win at the 2002 #WorldCup.

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 100 - Olivier Giroud has scored #FRA's 100th goal at #WorldCup finals. Landmark.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Today's #WorldCup coverage plan: NED-CHI: 11:30 AM ET, ESPN AUS-ESP: 11:30 AM ET, ESPN2 CRO-MEX: 3:30 ET, ESPN CMR-BRA: 3:30 ET, ESPN

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 1st - Karim Benzema is the first player to miss a penalty at the 2014 #WorldCup, with the previous seven being scored. Hot.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Karim Benzema is the first French player to miss a #WorldCup penalty. They'd converted all 10 previously.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: France up 3-0 on Switzerland, which had allowed a total of two goals in its previous eight #WorldCup games.

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 3 - #FRA have scored 3+ goals in consecutive World Cup games for the first time since the Group Stages of the 1998 #WorldCup. Romp.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: France has scored three first-half goals in a #WorldCup game for the fourth time, first since 1978.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: #USMNT has conceded seven goals in the first five minutes of #WorldCup games, most by any team in WC history.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: France has scored five goals in a #WorldCup game for the third time, first since 1958.

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 5 - Karim Benzema has played a hand in five of #FRA's eight goals so far in the 2014 #WorldCup (three goals, two assists). Inspiration.

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 3 - #NED have won three of the last four #WorldCup games in which they have gone behind. Warriors.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Today's #WorldCup coverage: ARG-IRN: 11:30 AM ET, ESPN GER-GHA: 2:30 ET, ESPN NGA-BIH, 5:30 ET, ESPN

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: David Villa extends his Spanish records with his 59th int'l goal and his 9th #WorldCup goal.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Varela's goal (90'+4:33) is the latest recorded #WorldCup goal in a regulation game.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: 77 goals thus far is the most through 26 #WorldCup games since 1982. A couple underlying numbers from cohort John Parolin...

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Average shot distance of 20.9 yards in 2014 is the closest of any #WorldCup in our data set (since 1966).

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Rise in scoring could be luck, skill, bad defense or mere variance. Whatever the reason, it's been fun. #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Honduras ended its #WorldCup scoring drought 7 minutes shy of Bolivia's record of 517, set from 1930 to 1994.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Enner Valencia is the first Ecuador player with two goals in a #WorldCup game.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Lionel Messi (90'+1) scores Argentina's latest-ever #WorldCup goal in regulation (excluding extra time).

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Neymar puts Brazil up 1-0 with the 100th goal of this #WorldCup.

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 4 - Neymar has now scored four times in three matches at the 2014 #WorldCup and eight times in his last six for #BRA. Leader.

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 6 - Costa Rica have scored in each of their six #WorldCup games against teams from the UEFA confederation. Set.

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 3 - Costa Rica scored three goals from just four shots on target in their opening #WorldCup match. Deft.

timelineItems.name: Kevin
timelineItems.text: Boka may cost #CIV a goal! #COLvsCIV #WorldCup2014
